## Source: ossf-package-analysis (4c845b16e857c2ac5f55bbe6944e5541b630ca1e1479b57930f9fd1e3f1c36ca)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'minecraft-net-core-services' @ 1.0.1 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.

- The package executes one or more commands associated with malicious behavior.
